headlines.description: Unfancied Watford continued their great start to the Premier League season with a third successive win when they beat visiting Crystal Palace 2-1.

video.headline: Watford 2-1 Crystal Palace: Pereyra scores again

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Watford 2-1 Crystal Palace: Pereyra scores again

headlines.shortLinkText: Watford beat Palace 2-1 for third straight win

headlines.description: Two goals in three minutes by Aleksandar Mitrovic helped Fulham to a first win of the Premier League campaign on Sunday when they beat Burnley 4-2.

video.headline: Fulham 4-2 Burnley: First win of the season

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Fulham 4-2 Burnley: First win of the season

headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham thrash Burnley for first win of season

headlines.description: Chelsea left it late but came away with a 2-1 win over Newcastle thanks to a late DeAndre Yedlin own goal St James' Park on Sunday.

video.headline: Newcastle 1-2 Chelsea: Yedlin own goal the difference

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Newcastle 1-2 Chelsea: Yedlin own goal the difference

headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea prevail at Newcastle with Yedlin own goal
